title: Living colors = Vivre en couleurs
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, distributor
National Film Board of Canada, production company
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Mass media - Social aspects
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Publicity
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Labor and laboring classes
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Mass media - Social aspects
description: Charcoal drawings depict the bleak world of the worker. Pastel drawings illustrate his dreams. Oftentimes, they are dreams created by the media. Are they tailored to his real needs? Or his pocket book? This film comments indirectly on the impact of publicity and its power to develop appetites that cannot be satisfied. An animation film without words.
